item.title: [UPDATED] Over 75% of Orgs Can't Keep Pace with AI-Powered Attacks, Survey Finds
item.description:
A new survey from CrowdStrike reveals a stark reality: 76% of global organizations admit they cannot match the speed and sophistication of AI-powered cyberattacks. The 2025 State of Ransomware Survey highlights a dangerous 'confidence illusion,' where leaders believe they are prepared, yet 78% of th...

item.title: [UPDATED] US Cyber Threat Sharing Law 'CISA 2015' Expires, Creating Potential Intelligence Gap
item.description:
